constexpr ~expected();
}}

===Main template destructor===
Destroys the contained value:
* If {{rlpt|operator_bool|has_value()}} is {{c|true}}, destroys the expected value.
* Otherwise, destroys the unexpected value.

This destructor is trivial if {{c|std::is_trivially_destructible_v&lt;T&gt;}} and {{c|std::is_trivially_destructible_v&lt;E&gt;}} are both {{c|true}}.

==={{c/core|void}} partial specialization destructor===
If {{rlpt|operator_bool|has_value()}} is {{c|false}}, destroys the unexpected value.

This destructor is trivial if {{c|std::is_trivially_destructible_v&lt;E&gt;}} is {{c|true}}.
